name: Shangri-La Space Quiz
description:
This is the first video game I ever made. 

The questions were written by chatGPT, so I can't promise every question has the correct answer. BUT there's a cheat button in the main menu, which'll highlight the correct answer.

There's 5 levels with 10 questions each. There's a bit of an ending after level 5.

Best with sound!

Now with back button to get back to the main menu!
